metadata.title: CVE-2018-12398 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
By using the reflected URL in some special resource URIs, such as chrome:, it is possible to inject stylesheets and bypass Content Security Policy (CSP). This vulnerability affects Firefox < 63.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-12398` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 63.0+build1-0ubuntu1
firefox-geckodriver - 63.0+build1-0ubuntu1
firefox-mozsymbols - 63.0+build1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '63.0+build1-0ubuntu1').
